name: Diego Francisco Ferraz Dini
biography: I am from Piracicaba, and although I started in mechanics, I have always had a passion for programming. My first project was a Discord bot using the Discord.js framework, which led me to learn JavaScript overnight and decide to pursue a career as a developer. Before fully focusing on programming, I worked in the automotive sector, where I gained valuable soft skills and a broader perspective on the corporate environment. Now, I am seeking my first opportunity as a developer to apply and expand my knowledge and contribute my passion and dedication to the field.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: Development of a task management application with functionalities for creating, editing, and tracking tasks, using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Creation of a complete e-commerce platform with payment gateway integration, inventory management, and recommendation system, using TypeScript and a fullstack setup.

projects.title: Technology Blog
projects.description: Development of a blog focused on technology, with functionalities for creating and managing posts, comments, and categories, implemented with React and GraphQL.

projects.title: Data Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Creation of an interactive dashboard for data analysis, with dynamic charts and reports, using D3.js and Node.js for the backend.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Development of a chat application with real-time messaging features, using WebSockets for instant communication and React for the frontend.

projects.title: Personal Project Manager
projects.description: Creation of a tool for managing personal projects, with functionalities for task organization, goals, and timelines, using Vue.js and Firebase.

projects.title: Hotel Reservation App
projects.description: Development of an application for hotel reservations with third-party API integration for availability and pricing inquiries, implemented with Angular and Node.js.
